name: Crossword Jigsaw - Word Search and Brain Puzzle with Friends
name_original: Crossword Jigsaw - Word Search and Brain Puzzle with Friends
description:
Crossword Jigsaw - A fantastic game combined with crossword and jigsaw puzzle. Given a grid of messy letter pieces, your task is to piece them together to form the correct words.

- Click and drag each letter piece
- Arrange pieces to form words
- Each level with particular theme
- Solve a slew of crossword jigsaws

Are you ready to take the challenge? Come on! You must boost your brain to advance in the Crossword Jigsaw!
